Web.Photo.Video

About Me

Image of me
I am a freelancer in the NYC Metropolitan area with a variety of skills in web design, development, photography, and videography. I also work part-time at MLB Advanced Media as a Supervisor in the Logging/Cutting department.

Photo&Video

Work

CJ Sawmill & Lumber - A local small wood milling business was looking to build attract clients via the web. I assesed their services offered, and began to design a four page web site that would display the process and pricing along with a gallery (fueled by WordPress) where the owner can upload pictures of lumber for sale and customer projects. After the site launched in early 2016 the company saw greatly increased sales that summer.
Cuneo HS - Headshots take in the West Village (Manhattan) for an aspiring voice actor.
Logger Tools - At MLBAM the Gamenight Loggers for the NHL have an overwhelming amount of things to keep track of over a three hour broadcast. I designed and developed the Logger Tools to alleviate some of the mental stress put on a logger while using up a small amount of screen real estate as possible.
Spare Key - (Directory of Photography - RED Scarlet X) - A short film in which an overworked wife blows off steam to a friend who holds a dark secret.
The Art of Illusion - (Producer, Cameraman, and Assistant Editor - Avid, Panasonic HPX 370, Tascam DR-40) - A documentary diving into the lives of two full time magicians thriving in today's tech age.
